name: bbPress Keyboard Shortcuts
author: Nikhil Vimal

sections.description:
This plugin gives you keyboard shortcuts to easily use with bbPress.

Keyboard Shortcuts Included: – CMD + Enter – To Submit a reply – Control + Enter – To submit a reply
sections.installation:
1. Unpack the entire contents of this plugin zip file into your wp-content/plugins/ folder locally
  2. Upload to your site
  3. Navigate to wp-admin/plugins.php on your site (your WP Admin plugin page)
  4. Activate this plugin

OR you can just install it with WordPress by going to Plugins >> Add New >> and type this plugin\’s name
sections.faq:
Will there be more keyboard shortcuts?

Yep! Watch out for more in the near future.

Can I request keyboard shortcuts?

If you would like a shortcut, you can request it here: https://github.com/NikV/bbPress-keyboard-shortcuts/issues/6

short_description: Ever wanted keyboard shortcuts with bbPress?
